Cards: Icon+Text Callout

Use this design feature to call special attention to an important note. 

The first example on this page is the preferred color combination, however there are several other color combinations below that you're also welcome to choose from.

Accessibility Note: Icons must have alt text such as "Alert", "Group work", "Bookmark This", "Downloadable Resource", or "Take a closer look". If you use consistent headers of a similar nature each time you use a block of this type, alt tags for icons may be left blank.

Use the appropriate header level (h2, h3, or h4 as needed)

You can use paragraph text here, or...

  1. or an ordered list, or...
  • an unordered list.

Additional Color Options

Below are several other color combinations you might use.

Teal Monochromatic Option

You could use this design feature to call out particular kinds of assignments or activities in a course.

Green Monochromatic Option

You might also use this to draw attention to relevant websites or external resources.

Orange Monochromatic Option

They could also be used to highlight downloadable content like Word Documents.

Gray Monochromatic Option

You might find many uses for this flexible design feature in your courses. The important thing to remember is to use them consistently.
